remarks: A conjugated subgroup is also a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
conjghm.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
conjghm.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
conjghm.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
conjsubg.f $e |- F = ( x e. S |-> ( ( A .+ x ) .- A ) ) $.
conjsubg $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. X ) -> ran F e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d .- x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
